wikitext.*:
{|class="wikitable" border=0 style="float: right; font-size: 90%; margin: 1em 0 1em 1em; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #999999 solid; border-collapse: collapse; clear: right;" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" |colspan=6 align="center" bgcolor="pink" |'''[[BanG Dream！少女乐团派对！]]''' |- {{ #if: {{{ID|}}} | ! bgcolor="#E0FFFF"{{!}} {{#if:{{{ID|}}}|ID}} {{!}} colspan=1 align="center" {{!}}{{{ID|}}} }} {{ #if: {{{长度|}}} | ! bgcolor="#E0FFFF"{{!}} {{#if:{{{长度|}}}|长度}} {{!}} colspan=2 align="center" {{!}}{{{长度|}}} }} |- {{ #if: {{{解锁条件|}}} | ! bgcolor="#E0FFFF"{{!}} {{#if:{{{解锁条件| }}}|解锁条件}} {{!}} colspan=4 align="center" {{!}}{{{解锁条件|}}} }} |- !colspan=5 style="text-align: center;"|难度 |- !style="background:#3076F9;"|EASY !style="background:#5BF039"|NORMAL !style="background:#FAC32F;"|HARD !style="background:#FF2A2E;"|EXPERT !style="background:#EE2299;"|SPECIAL |-style="text-align: center;" |{{{EASY|?}}} || {{{NORMAL|?}}} || {{{HARD|?}}} || {{{EXPERT|?}}} || {{{SPECIAL|-}}} |-style="text-align: center;" |{{{NEASY|?}}} || {{{NNORMAL|?}}} || {{{NHARD|?}}} || {{{NEXPERT|?}}} || {{{NSPECIAL|-}}} |- |} ==使用方法== 

{{BangdreamSongGai/Game
|ID= 
|长度= 
|解锁条件= 
|EASY= 
|NORMAL= 
|HARD= 
|EXPERT= 
|SPECIAL= 
|NEASY=
|NNORMAL=
|NHARD=
|NEXPERT=
|NSPECIAL=
}}
注：NEASY~NEXPERT为对应难度下的NOTE数 ===例子=== 

{{BangdreamSongGai/Game
|ID= 29
|长度= 1:50
|解锁条件= 完成Roselia第2话
|EASY= 6
|NORMAL= 13
|HARD= 16
|EXPERT= 25
|SPECIAL= 26
|NEASY=81
|NNORMAL=214
|NHARD=309
|NEXPERT=506
|NSPECIAL=575
}}
